notesStmt.note: Dirt at edges. Mould-spotting where parchment lies against roller at inner end. A few usage stains. Slight burn-through of ink in a few places. Small splits in silk tie.
One strip (212mm x 191mm) containing one column is rolled up with the manuscript.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
